results.title: Trump Impeached for Abuse of Power and Obstruction of Congress
results.abstract: Voting nearly along party lines, the House approved two articles of impeachment against President Trump, making him the third president in history to face removal by the Senate.
results.byline: By NICHOLAS FANDOS and MICHAEL D. SHEAR
des_facet: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-Blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
Russian Interference in 2016 US Elections and Ties to Trump Associates

results.title: Trump Impeachment Trial in Doubt as a House Leader Suggests Withholding Articles
results.abstract: The comments by Representative James E. Clyburn, the No. 3 Democratic leader, cast further uncertainty on the path forward for a Senate trial of President Trump.
results.byline: By NICHOLAS FANDOS and SHERYL GAY STOLBERG
des_facet: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-Blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry

results.title: A President Impeached, and a Nation Convulsed
results.abstract: The impeachment battles over Andrew Johnson, Richard M. Nixon and Bill Clinton came at turning points in the American story. The time that produced President Trump has proved to be another one.
des_facet: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-Blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry

results.title: Trump, Unbowed, Uses Rally to Strike Back Against Impeachment Vote
results.abstract: The president traveled to Michigan, a vital electoral state, to deliver his response after he became the third president to be impeached by the House.
results.byline: By MICHAEL CROWLEY, ANNIE KARNI and MAGGIE HABERMAN
des_facet: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-Blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry

results.title: How TV Covered the Moment of Impeachment
results.abstract: Tucker Carlson was grim. Sean Hannity was angry. Two networks seemed reluctant to leave their scheduled prime-time shows.

results.title: Putin Hints at Holding Power Past 2024, and Defends Trump on Impeachment
results.abstract: Russia’s president mused about repealing the term limit he faces, and echoed Republican talking points saying that impeachment was a baseless bid to reverse the 2016 election.
des_facet: Russian Interference in 2016 US Elections and Ties to Trump Associates

results.title: How 2 Soviet Émigrés Fueled the Trump Impeachment Flames
results.abstract: “Lev and Igor” were obscure businessmen who became fixtures of the Republican donor set. Then they played an unlikely role in the proceedings gripping the nation.
results.byline: By MICHAEL ROTHFELD, BEN PROTESS, WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM, KENNETH P. VOGEL and ANDREW E. KRAMER

results.title: Andrew Yang Is Onstage, but Offstage, Asian-Americans Wonder Where They Fit In
results.abstract: The Democrats have a historically diverse field, but the Asian-American entrepreneur will be debating with six white candidates.
results.byline: By JENNIFER MEDINA and MATT STEVENS
